message.subject: updated authorised trader list
message.content:
M1.1. Sara,
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. We will need John Weakly added to the authorized trader list for ECT
Investments and ENA (similar to Selena Gonzales and David Vitrella) [Y]
[Inform: John Weakly should be added to authorized trader list for ECT and ENA]
Sflink1.2
M1.3. Please
let me know what info you may need from me to make this happen.
[Inform: Sara should tell Laurel if she needs any info to facilitate this update]
M1.4. Thanks for
your help!
[Conventional: thanks]
